thread.title: Female maths teacher who had sex with student on trip abroad with his family WALKS FREE
thread.title_full: Female maths teacher who had sex with student on trip abroad with his family WALKS FREE

title: Female maths teacher who had sex with student on trip abroad with his family WALKS FREE
text:
Female maths teacher who had sex with student on trip abroad with his family WALKS FREE Female maths teacher who had sex with student on trip abroad with his family WALKS FREE A MATHS teacher who had sex with two students and sent raunchy pictures on social media will avoid being jailed, according to her lawyer. PUBLISHED: 01:31, Sun, Feb 5, 2017 | UPDATED: 01:44, Sun, Feb 5, 2017 
Haeli Wey, 29, admitted having regular sex with two high-school students under her charge. 
The teacher admitted to sleeping with one of the teens 10 times including on a foreign trip with the boy’s family. PH Haeli Wey, 29, admitted having regular sex with two high-school students Related articles Headteacher 'performed oral sex on 16-year-old', council hearing told 
Wey – who would regularly send nude selfies to the 17-year-olds – will not have to register as a sex offender, prosecutor Geoffrey Puryear told local media. 
And Wey’s lawyer has revealed she will get probation instead of a prison sentence when she is sentenced next month. 
One of the boys told police he started having sex with the maths teacher she joined his family holiday in Africa. GOOGLE Wey resigned from Westlake High School in 2015 I think because she’s an attractive young woman, that it’s drawn a lot more attention than if it was a male Larry Sauer 
A police report said: "The victim said while in Africa his relationship with Ms Wey become more personal and on a deeper level. 
"The victim stated while in Africa their relationship became physical.” 
The second victim said he had sex with Wey on the hike after she began talking to him on social media. PH She admitted to having sex with one pupil on a school trip 
After their lovemaking session, the boy claims she told him to delete their conversation 
She texted him: “Delete our convo from Instagram please and don’t let anyone get a hold of ur phone.” 
The first student then told his parents about his relationship with Wey and they called the police. 
Wey resigned from Westlake High School in Texas, in October 2015. 
Her lawyer Larry Sauer said at the time: “I think because she’s an attractive young woman, that it’s drawn a lot more attention than if it was a male.” Related articles
